**LunarVPS** provides managed OpenVZ, KVM & XEN VPS services in Swiss location with port Speeds of 1Gbps.

These VPS comes with a Superior connectivity with Unmatched Bandwidth at very Affordable Prices. 

Our High Performance XEON Nodes are built for providing 99.98% Uptime with Quality Service. 


All VPS plans can be upgraded at any instant time.




**LunarVPS** Customers enjoy the following benefits:


- We are not resellers, we have our own leased dedicated server.

- Our Infrastructure is reliable and powerful to suit any needs.

- Fantastic Ticket Support. We are a Keen Dedicated Team.

- No Content Restrictions!

- Rapid Response Support Team!

- Anytime Money Back Guaranteed!

- 99.9% Server Uptime Guaranteed!


**PAYMENT ACCEPTED**

- Paypal
- Payza
- Skrill
- Bitcoin
- Perfect Money
- Web money
- Wire Transfer
- Credit Card
